abstract.t: This document redefines the use of the IPv6 Flow Label field to allow specification of the lowest MTU on a path that the packet travels, thus in most cases avoiding the need for performing Path MTU Discovery and the round-trip penalty that that occurs for processing the ICMPv6 PTB and retransmitting the packets involved. This specification allows graceful decrease of MTU so that large and non-standard MTU sizes can safely be used on the Internet.
